def: Where a business holds stocks just in case there is a delay from suppliers or a sudden unexpected increase in demand
When the cost per unit falls if large orders are placed with suppliers due to a bulk discount
Where businesses select suppliers - establish terms of payment and negotiate a contract
This refers to all the businesses - people and activities that take part in the production processes from start until it arrives with the customer
This refers to the movement of goods - services - information and money throughout the production process
